00017 typedef CWinTraitsOR<WS_CHILD | WS_VISIBLE | TVS_HASLINES | TVS_SHOWSELALWAYS | TVS_LINESATROOT | TVS_HASBUTTONS | TVS_EDITLABELS >      CNCTreeViewTraits;
00018 
00019 class CStepNCTreeView :
00020   public CWindowImpl<CStepNCTreeView, WTL::CTreeViewCtrlEx, CNCTreeViewTraits>,
00021   public CMessageFilter
00022 {
00023 public:
00024   DECLARE_WND_SUPERCLASS(NULL, CTreeViewCtrl::GetWndClassName()); 
00025   CStepNCTreeView(void);
00026   ~CStepNCTreeView(void);
00027   CToolTipCtrl m_ToolTip;
00028   enum { alpha=6, numeric=5, simplelistitem=12, list=7, entity=2 };
00029   
00030   HRESULT     BuildTree(CVarDefs *vars, CTreeItem parent=NULL);
00031   HRESULT     BuildTreeBranch(CVarDef * vardef, CTreeItem parent=NULL, CTreeItem prev=TVI_LAST);
00032   HRESULT     BuildEntityTreeBranch(CVarDef * vardef, CTreeItem parent, CTreeItem ti);
00033   CTreeItem   InsertTreeItem(CString text, UINT image, UINT selectedimage, CVarDef * vardef, HTREEITEM parent, HTREEITEM after);
00034   CTreeItem   InsertSimpleTypeTreeItem(CVarDef * vardef, CTreeItem parent, CTreeItem ti);
00035   LRESULT     DeleteTreeItem(CTreeItem ti);
00036   void      InvalidateTreeItem(CTreeItem ti);
00037   LRESULT     MoveUpDown(CTreeItem ti, int id);
00038   void      RebuildTree(CTreeItem ti, IStepNodePtr newstep,  CVarDefPtr vardef);
00039 
00040   BOOL PreTranslateMessage(MSG* pMsg)
00041   {
00042     if(m_ToolTip.IsWindow())
00043        m_ToolTip.RelayEvent(pMsg);
00044      return false;
00045   }
00046   
00047   BEGIN_MSG_MAP(CStepNCTreeView)
00048     MSG_WM_CREATE(OnCreate)
00049     MESSAGE_HANDLER(WM_RBUTTONDOWN, OnMouseRightClick)
00050 
00051     REFLECTED_NOTIFY_CODE_HANDLER(TVN_SELCHANGED, OnSelectChangeTree)
00052 
00053     REFLECTED_NOTIFY_CODE_HANDLER_EX(NM_DBLCLK, OnTreeDblClick)
00054     REFLECTED_NOTIFY_CODE_HANDLER(TVN_BEGINLABELEDIT, OnBeginLabelEditnotify)
00055     REFLECTED_NOTIFY_CODE_HANDLER(TVN_ENDLABELEDIT, OnEndLabelEditnotify)
00056 
00057     
00058 
00059     FORWARD_NOTIFICATIONS()
00060     DEFAULT_REFLECTION_HANDLER()
00061 
00062   END_MSG_MAP()
00063 
00064 
00065   bool IsMoveUpEnabled();
00066   bool IsMoveDownEnabled();
00067   bool IsDeleteEnabled(){ CTreeItem ti=GetSelectedItem(); return !ti.IsNull(); }
00068   LRESULT OnMoveUp(WORD /*wNotifyCode*/, WORD /*wID*/, HWND /*hWndCtl*/, BOOL& /*bHandled*/);
00069   LRESULT OnMoveDown(WORD /*wNotifyCode*/, WORD /*wID*/, HWND /*hWndCtl*/, BOOL& /*bHandled*/);
00070   LRESULT OnDeleteItem(WORD /*wNotifyCode*/, WORD /*wID*/, HWND /*hWndCtl*/, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
00071   { CTreeItem ti=GetSelectedItem(); return DeleteTreeItem(ti); }
00072 
00073 
00074   int OnCreate(LPCREATESTRUCT lpCreateStruct);
00075 
00076   LRESULT OnTreeDblClick(LPNMHDR pnmh);
00077   LRESULT OnKeydownnotify(WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPNMHDR /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled);
00078 
00079   
00080   LRESULT OnSelectChangeTree(WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPNMHDR /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled);
00081   LRESULT OnEndLabelEditnotify(WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPNMHDR /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled);
00082   LRESULT OnBeginLabelEditnotify( WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPNMHDR /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled);
00083   LRESULT OnSelectChangeTree(NMHDR* phdr)
00084   {
00085     return 0;
00086   }
00087   void DeleteBranchChildren(CTreeItem it);
00088 
00089   LRESULT OnMouseRightClick(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled);
00091   CImageList m_treeicon;
00092   HWND Bug_Handle;
00093   CSymbolTable menutable;
00094   CVarDefPtr _copyvardef;
00095 
00096 };
